Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4415 affecting package systemd-bootstrap for versions less than 250.3-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4415 affecting package systemd-bootstrap for versions less than 250.3-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package systemd-bootstrap is earlier than 250.3-15, affected by CVE-2022-4415
